Title: Inception
Description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology.

Title: The Shawshank Redemption
Description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption.

Title: Titanic
Description: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious Titanic.

Title: Interstellar
Description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

Title: The Dark Knight
Description: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind who plunges Gotham into chaos.

Title: Forrest Gump
Description: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, Vietnam, Watergate, and other events unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man.

Title: The Matrix
Description: A computer hacker learns about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

Title: The Godfather
Description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his empire to his reluctant son.
